verses.text: \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*. \w Howl|strong="H3213"\w*, ye \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sea|strong="H8659"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H7703"\w*, \w from|strong="H0935"\w* whence \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H0776"\w* wont \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Cethim \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3220"\w* silent, \w you|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H5674"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* island: \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w merchants|strong="H5503"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Sidon|strong="H6721"\w* \w passing|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w have|strong="H0339"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* thee.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w river|strong="H2975"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w revenue|strong="H8393"\w*: \w and|strong="H4325"\w* she \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* mart \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3808"\w* thou \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, O \w Sidon|strong="H6721"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* speaketh, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H0954"\w* \w in|strong="H3220"\w* labour, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w brought|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* nourished \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w young|strong="H0970"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H3205"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w virgins|strong="H1330"\w*.

\w When|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* be heard \w in|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* be sorry \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* hear \w of|strong="H8088"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*:

\w Pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* seas, \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*, ye \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* island.

\w Is|strong="H3117"\w* not \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w your|strong="H3117"\w* \w city|strong="H6927"\w*, which gloried \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* old \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H3117"\w* \w antiquity|strong="H6927"\w*? \w her|strong="H3117"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w carry|strong="H2986"\w* \w her|strong="H3117"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* sojourn.

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* hath taken \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* formerly \w crowned|strong="H5849"\w*, \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w merchants|strong="H5503"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w traders|strong="H5503"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w nobles|strong="H3513"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*?

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath designed \w it|strong="H7043"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* pull down \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3513"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* bring \w to|strong="H3068"\w* disgrace \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w glorious|strong="H3513"\w* ones \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Pass|strong="H5674"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w as|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H5750"\w* \w river|strong="H2975"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w sea|strong="H8659"\w*, thou hast \w a|strong="H5750"\w* girdle \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w troubled|strong="H7264"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w given|strong="H6680"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w charge|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Chanaan, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w strong|strong="H4581"\w* ones thereof.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Thou shalt glory \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*, O \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Sidon|strong="H6721"\w*, \w who|strong="H0559"\w* art \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w*: \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* sail \w over|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Cethim, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* thou shalt \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w*, \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H7760"\w* Assyrian \w founded|strong="H3245"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* led away \w the|strong="H7760"\w* strong ones thereof \w into|strong="H0776"\w* captivity, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* destroyed \w the|strong="H7760"\w* houses thereof, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* ruin.

\w Howl|strong="H3213"\w*, O ye \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* \w of|strong="H0591"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sea|strong="H8659"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* laid \w waste|strong="H7703"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* thou, O \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*, shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w*, \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, according \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H7093"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* unto \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*, \w go|strong="H5437"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, thou \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w that|strong="H4616"\w* hast \w been|strong="H2142"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w*: sing \w well|strong="H3190"\w*, sing \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*, \w that|strong="H4616"\w* thou mayst be \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* traffic: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w commit|strong="H6485"\w* fornication \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w world|strong="H0776"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w merchandise|strong="H5504"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w hire|strong="H0868"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* sanctified \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w kept|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w store|strong="H0686"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w laid|strong="H0686"\w* \w up|strong="H0398"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w merchandise|strong="H5504"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* unto fulness, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* clothed \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* continuance.
